items.sentence: I\'m thinking of going to Boston to visit Tom.
Don\'t you ever get tired of listening to Tom?
I don\'t think Tom is back from Australia yet.
I don\'t think Tom was in Australia last week.
Tom\'s injuries weren\'t as severe as Mary\'s.
Tom peeked into the box to see what was in it.
Tom puttered around in the garden all morning.
I can\'t believe the way everyone is reacting.
Would you be willing to write a letter for me?
Would you have time to fix this flat tire now?
